reviewText:
Me and my wife saw this movie when it was new (89). We read the cover on the back and decided to save the best till last.
We struggled through the first 30 minutes, but antipated that it would get better. Another 15 minutes... Now we're struggling.
I can literally say that when someone asks, "What is the worst movie you have ever seen?". Hands down, "Quarantine".
However, I am thinking about purchasing it, only to have proof.
One more thing. I wanted to give it no stars, until I found out that it is not possible. Therefore, I give a star to the cover.
